events.blurb: Latest Possible Extent of Armando Dippet's tenure as Headmaster
events.description:
Given [Remus Lupin] was bitten by [Fenrir Greyback] at age four,
we can derive that [Dumbledore] must be Headmaster soon after
this date. 

[Remus Lupin]: <../people/lupin/remus/>

[Fenrir Greyback]: <../people/greyback/fenrir/>

[Dumbledore]: <../people/Dumbledore/Albus_Percival_Wulfric_Brian/>
events.source:
* Mrs. J. K. Rowling.
  [Remus Lupin](https://www.rowlingindex.org/work/pmrl/)
  [The J.K. Rowling Index](https://www.rowlingindex.org/)
  Originally Published: 2013-07-31. Last Viewed: 2023-12-04.
* Mrs. J. K. Rowling. 
  _[Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban]_
  p. 353. Pottermore Limited. American Kindle Edition.

[Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban]: https://www.librarything.com/work/2742161/
